Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: In the Footsteps of Paul
programme.desc: The world of the Apostle Paul and how to apply his teachings to today.

programme.title: It Is Written
programme.desc: "It Is Written" has been a staple on American television since premiering in 1956. The weekly program, currently hosted by John Bradshaw, applies timeless truths to everyday life, with many episodes dealing with issues such as loneliness, fear, low self-esteem and spiritual principles. With its straightforward, uplifting presentations, the program aims to inspire and encourage people of all faiths and creeds. Founded by George Vandeman, "It Is Written" was the first religious telecast to air in color.

programme.desc: The Faith of Jesus is, at its foundational level, Jesus Christ giving His life for the human race; it is not every heart responds, but every heart may, and can if it will, respond to that love that is without parallel; Jesus gives His life for all.

The weekly program, currently hosted by John Bradshaw, applies timeless truths to everyday life, with many episodes dealing with issues such as loneliness, fear, low self-esteem and spiritual principles. With its straightforward, uplifting presentations, the program aims to inspire and encourage people of all faiths and creeds. Founded by George Vandeman, "It Is Written" was the first religious telecast to air in color.

programme.title: 25 Words or Less
programme.desc: Teams play a fast-paced word game; celebrity guests Melissa Peterman, Marcia Cross, Caroline Rhea and Nico Santos.

programme.title: 25 Words or Less
programme.desc: Teams play a rapid-fire word game; celebrity guests Caroline Rhea, Nico Santos, Melissa Peterman and Marcia Cross.

programme.title: Mountain Masters
programme.desc: S1 E1 Survive and Conquer On every episode, four expert survivalists from across the country compete against each other as they race up a treacherous mountain. Their wilderness skills and mental fortitude are put to the test over the course of three grueling challenges while they are evaluated by judges. One-by-one, the contestants are eliminated until only one remains at the summit to claim the $10,000 prize and the title of Mountain Master.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E19 The Spoiler An elderly couple move to North Fork and settle down under a false name to keep the town from knowing they are parents of a vicious killer on the loose. However, their plan fails when their son shows up and causes chaos.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E20 Heller A teenage girl named Heller and her brother are abused by her drunken stepfather. The town becomes aware after Heller is caught stealing from the general store. The children plan the drunk's demise as the cruelty continues. Lucas steps in to help.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E21 The Grasshopper When Lucas and Mark go on a train trip, clouds of swarming grasshoppers force the train to stop. A prisoner takes advantage of the emergency and breaks free, then kills Marshal Dixon. Lucas, with the help of a buffalo hunter, outwits the outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E22 A Time for Singing Outlaws kill a preacher and his wife. Two members of the group assume their identity and come to North Fork to rob the bank. However, when Mark finds out who they really are, he is kidnapped and kept quiet. Lucas and Micah set out to stop the gang.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E9 Rendezvous at Red Rock A bank robber guilty of murder frees Cheyenne after he's accused of the crime and lures him in on a deal to rob a bank in Red Rock. However, Cheyenne foils the bank robber's plans after he meets the town's marshal.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E10 West of the River Cheyenne leads a group of stockade prisoners on a mission to rescue two girls kidnapped by the Kiowa five years ago. Along the journey, he begins to wonder if the girls really do want to be returned to their father after all.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Kid The Kid becomes part of a group of six Pony Express riders in the Old West based at the Sweetwater Station in the Nebraska territory. He meets station master, Teaspoon Hunter, and fellow riders, Buck, Jimmy, Ike, Cody and Lou.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E2 Gunfighter Childhood memories are torturing Jimmy. When he accidentally spooks a horse, the man riding it is insulted. The man, Longley, is a hired gun and demands an apology. Teaspoon tries to help Jimmy with his issues, but he decides to fight the man.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E7 The Assailants When Senator Jim Borden visits North Fork, Marshal Micah Torrance receives a telegram stating an assassination attempt could be made on the senator's life. The plot begins to unfold as four gunman disguised as cavalrymen arrive with a Gatling gun.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E8 Mark's Rifle Marty Blair rides into North Fork to promote a circus coming out west from Ohio. Blair is soon under suspicion when there is an attempted robbery at the hotel. Mark finds it hard to believe that Blair is guilty, however, Lucas feels differently.

programme.title: Only the Valiant
programme.desc: A cavalry officer is blamed by his men and his lady for the death of a popular officer. Now, he must find a way to stop an Indian attack on their fort. It might prove to be the only way to regain the trust of his men and the affection of his woman.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: It's the late 1800s and a marshal must stop a volatile and growing conflict between homesteaders and cattle drivers in his small town on the Kansas frontier.

programme.title: Mountain Masters
programme.desc: S1 E1 Survive and Conquer On every episode, four expert survivalists from across the country compete against each other as they race up a treacherous mountain. Their wilderness skills and mental fortitude are put to the test over the course of three grueling challenges while they are evaluated by judges. One-by-one, the contestants are eliminated until only one remains at the summit to claim the $10,000 prize and the title of Mountain Master.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E19 The Spoiler An elderly couple move to North Fork and settle down under a false name to keep the town from knowing they are parents of a vicious killer on the loose. However, their plan fails when their son shows up and causes chaos.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E20 Heller A teenage girl named Heller and her brother are abused by her drunken stepfather. The town becomes aware after Heller is caught stealing from the general store. The children plan the drunk's demise as the cruelty continues. Lucas steps in to help.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E21 The Grasshopper When Lucas and Mark go on a train trip, clouds of swarming grasshoppers force the train to stop. A prisoner takes advantage of the emergency and breaks free, then kills Marshal Dixon. Lucas, with the help of a buffalo hunter, outwits the outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E22 A Time for Singing Outlaws kill a preacher and his wife. Two members of the group assume their identity and come to North Fork to rob the bank. However, when Mark finds out who they really are, he is kidnapped and kept quiet. Lucas and Micah set out to stop the gang.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E9 Rendezvous at Red Rock A bank robber guilty of murder frees Cheyenne after he's accused of the crime and lures him in on a deal to rob a bank in Red Rock. However, Cheyenne foils the bank robber's plans after he meets the town's marshal.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E10 West of the River Cheyenne leads a group of stockade prisoners on a mission to rescue two girls kidnapped by the Kiowa five years ago. Along the journey, he begins to wonder if the girls really do want to be returned to their father after all.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E3 Home of the Brave After an Indian attack on settlers, Buck finds himself in the middle, torn between his loyalty to his Kiowa brother and his bond with Pony Express members. After the tribe captures Ike, Buck must prove that he is a real Indian at heart.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E4 Speak No Evil Ike witnesses a stagecoach massacre and turns the killer's leader over to the marshal. However, the gang kidnaps and threatens to kill one of the riders if Ike testifies. It is a race against time to serve justice and keep one of their own alive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E9 The Most Amazing Man Wade Randall comes to North Fork and mesmerizes children with big stories of his past gun battles with outlaws. Lucas suspects he is all talk and exposes the truth after Randall refuses to accept a shootout challenge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E10 Squeeze Play A land speculator named Willard Prescott contacts Lucas about buying his land as the railroad is fast approaching the area. He bribes Lucas and when he refuses, Prescott makes it clear he will stop at nothing to get his land, one way or the other.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S2 E10 Last Hand Standing In the season finale of Ultimate Cowboy Showdown, the top three competitors cowboy up for a chance to win it all. In the last elimination challenge, the cowboys must work as a team to separate the prized cattle from two hundred other cows and drive the herd to a semi-truck, where they will load them up for the winner to take home. A big job for three cowboys, frustrations get the best of them. One contestant covers the rougher country to stand out to the judges. Another cowboy suggests breaking the rules to finish the job, but their teammate steps up and takes the lead to get the job done right. Trace sits down with each cowboy to talk about what winning would mean to them before announcing the Ultimate Cowboy Showdown winner.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E2 Bass Reeves: A Father's Justice After a man murders his wife in a jealous rage and goes on the run, local lawmen are stunned when legendary Marshal Bass Reeves accepts responsibility for bringing the killer to justice...because the murderer is none other than Reeves' own son.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E10 Willie Kennard Makes His Mark in History Under siege by gunslingers, the gold mining town of Yankee Hill runs a newspaper advertisement to find a new marshal. Former slave and Union soldier Willie Kennard answers the ad, but he faces prejudice and doubt as he works to restore law and order.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E8 William Sublette: King of the Fur Trade In his quest to become king of the fur trade, William Sublette revolutionizes the industry and puts his life on the line in the process. But he may risk too much when he rushes to save his comrades in the largest battle of the mountain man era.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E10 A Tiger's Tale Cody and Noah have the huge task of delivering a tiger to St. Joseph, Missouri, while protecting two nuns and a young lady named Elizabeth. Cody soon falls for Elizabeth. Soon trouble arises when they must fight off hunters wanting the tiger's hide.

programme.title: Elkhorn
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Greenhorn After suffering a great personal loss, 25-year-old Theodore Roosevelt abandons New York for the lawless Dakota Badlands. Along the way, he faces doubters and killers as he attempts to establish the Elkhorn Ranch and remake himself into a cattleman.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E23 The Deserter A wounded Army deserter shows up at the McCain Ranch desperate for a horse. Lucas takes him in just as the Army Cavalry unit appears to take the deserter into custody. In town, the harsh commanding officer demands he be executed for desertion.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E24 The Vision Mark drinks some tainted water from a barrel and contracts typhoid fever. Lucas is forced to use an eccentric old doctor. During bouts of a continuous intense fever, Mark becomes delirious and has a vision of his deceased mother, who he never knew.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E25 The Lariat Lariat Jones, an old friend of Lucas', comes to North Fork to open up a new gambling casino. Jones has an excellent reputation as an honest gambler. But when two strangers become his partners, accusations of cheating become deadly for Jones.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E26 Smoke Screen A beautiful headstrong young woman named Marge Crandell doesn't like to be told what to do by anyone. Several men vie for her attention and when Lucas finds her dead, one of the men becomes a prime suspect due to a simple clue, a half-smoked cigar.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E11 Quicksand In order to help a wagon load of traveling settlers in need of rescue and supplies, Cheyenne fights to show his courage against an Indian chief in a pit of swallowing sand. The first one to yell for help loses the fight.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E12 Fury at Rio Hondo As Cheyenne travels through Mexico, he finds himself in an area plagued by political unrest from revolutionaries. He encounters a blonde pickpocket singer in Rio Hondo who happens to be with a man who owes him money from a cattle deal.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E3 Home of the Brave After an Indian attack on settlers, Buck finds himself in the middle, torn between his loyalty to his Kiowa brother and his bond with Pony Express members. After the tribe captures Ike, Buck must prove that he is a real Indian at heart.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E12 Fury at Rio Hondo As Cheyenne travels through Mexico, he finds himself in an area plagued by political unrest from revolutionaries. He encounters a blonde pickpocket singer in Rio Hondo who happens to be with a man who owes him money from a cattle deal.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E5 Bad Blood Lou returns to her childhood orphanage to get her younger brother and sister. However, her gunrunning father gets to them first and hides them in his compound. When Lou confronts him, the other riders discover that Lou is actually a girl.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E6 Ten-Cent Hero A dime novelist takes revenge on Jimmy by creating a story in his latest novel, penning him as Wild Bill Hickok, "the fastest gun in the West." Soon afterward, a hired gunman arrives in Sweetwater to take him down in a gunfight.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E11 Gun Shy After one of Mark's friends dies due to a shooting accident, he is totally against his father having a rifle. Lucas explains in vain the need for a rifle on the frontier, leading to Mark running away. Meanwhile, Lou has problems with a wanted outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E12 The Anvil Chorus North Fork's blacksmith, Nils Swenson, volunteers to fill in for Marshal Micah Torrance while he is out of town. To keep the peace, Nils starts a policy that everyone turns in their gun upon entry to the town. His plan backfires when outlaws arrive.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E1 They Killed Me Frontiersman Jim Bridger spins an incredible tale to a group of settlers, claiming he was once killed by Blackfeet warriors yet somehow lived to tell the tale. They think he's joking, but Bridger soon proves that he really did rise from the dead.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E4 Brothers in Arms When they are ambushed by a Blackfeet war party, Jim Bridger and a lone Shoshone brave must work together to find a way to defeat their common enemy. If they can't overcome their suspicions and learn to trust each other, they may not survive the day.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E11 John Wesley Hardin: Killer on the Texas Frontier When outlaw John Wesley Hardin murders a sheriff, a hard-charging Texas Ranger joins forces with a cool-headed police detective to hunt the killer. The unlikely duo must learn how to work together to end Hardin's reign of terror once and for all.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E5 Wong Fee Lee Stakes His Claim Chinese immigrant Wong Fee Lee joins a convoy of miners headed to Deadwood, where he hopes to strike gold and start a business. But when the Black Hills Bandits stand in their way, Wong must find the strength to lead his fellow prospectors in battle.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E2 Joe Meek: Cunning Captive A teenaged Joe Meek arrives on the frontier as a greenhorn, but he quickly masters the skills of mountain man life. Just as his trapping career is taking off, he faces a life-or-death challenge when he's taken captive by warriors from the Crow tribe.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E11 Good Night Sweet Charlotte Charlotte, an old friend of Lou's, comes to Rock Creek and stirs up bad memories of a man who had hurt them both. Lou distances herself from Kid, but when Charlotte turns up dead, Lou confronts her past. Meanwhile, Jimmy befriends a Lakota Indian.

programme.title: Elkhorn
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Frenchman Before it's up and running, Theodore Roosevelt's new Elkhorn Ranch is threatened by a powerful neighbor who attempts an underhanded land grab. To save his ranch, Roosevelt confronts his neighbor, the Marquis de Mores, and his beguiling wife, Medora.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E27 Shotgun Man Lucas receives several mysterious threatening notes. He discovers they are being sent from ex-convict, John Beaumont, who is bent on revenge. Beaumont wants Lucas dead since he is the one responsible for his imprisonment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E28 Sins of the Father Andy Moon and his young son, Bobby, take shelter at the McCain Ranch. Andy killed a man in a gunfight in self-defense. Now, the man's brothers are after Moon. Complications arise when Bobby discovers the truth about their running from town to town.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E29 The Prodigal A bank robber hides at the McCain Ranch and takes Lucas and Mark hostage. Problems arise when the gunman's mother shows up, believing he owns the ranch and Mark is her grandson. The truth comes out when more gunmen arrive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E30 The Fourflusher Sharecropper Gabe Fenway enters his horse, Sapphire, in a race. His landlord, Jake Preston, bets Fenway that Mark's horse, Blueboy, will win. Preston wants Fenway's farm and bets $1000 against his whole year of crops. He will stop at nothing to win.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E13 Star in the Dust During his travels, Cheyenne arrives in a small town and quickly befriends the local sheriff. However, he soon finds himself caught up with a pretty young woman, as well as a stash of stolen money, which jeopardizes his new friendship.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E14 Johnny Bravo A wealthy rancher hires Cheyenne as a ranch foreman. Shortly after he begins his duties, his friend falls in love with the boss' beautiful daughter. However, the rancher has other plans, as his sights are set on Cheyenne to become his new son-in-law.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E5 Bad Blood Lou returns to her childhood orphanage to get her younger brother and sister. However, her gunrunning father gets to them first and hides them in his compound. When Lou confronts him, the other riders discover that Lou is actually a girl.

programme.desc: S2 E30 The Fourflusher Sharecropper Gabe Fenway enters his horse, Sapphire, in a race. His landlord, Jake Preston, bets Fenway that Mark's horse, Blueboy, will win. Preston wants Fenway's farm and bets $1000 against his whole year of crops. He will stop at nothing to win.

programme.desc: S1 E13 Star in the Dust During his travels, Cheyenne arrives in a small town and quickly befriends the local sheriff. However, he soon finds himself caught up with a pretty young woman, as well as a stash of stolen money, which jeopardizes his new friendship.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E14 Johnny Bravo A wealthy rancher hires Cheyenne as a ranch foreman. Shortly after he begins his duties, his friend falls in love with the boss' beautiful daughter. However, the rancher has other plans, as his sights are set on Cheyenne to become his new son-in-law.

programme.title: False Colors
programme.desc: The Kid enjoys a reunion with his long-lost brother, Jed. It seems as though Jed has found his place in the Army. However, he is actually posing as a cavalry member and is leading a gang to steal a gold shipment for the Confederacy.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E7 A Good Day to Die The Kid finds a young Indian warrior at the scene of a massacre and takes him into custody to face justice in Sweetwater. The warrior, named Curly, denies any wrongdoing. The Kid and the riders try to determine if he is responsible for the crime.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E13 Conflict While hunting, Lucas misses an easy shot at a cougar just a few feet away, and seconds from attacking Mark. After discovering that his gun is not the problem, Lucas begins to doubt his abilities with a rifle, leading him to do some soul-searching.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E14 Incident at Line Shack Six Railroad boss John Gangling runs an operation at Line Shack Six. Gangling pays his men in gold and when he finds that Charlie Been saves his wages in a money belt, he kills him for it. An innocent Indian who happens to stop by is accused of murder.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Spirit of Truth After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Fossil Feud When bloodthirsty Canadian trappers try to kill him, mountain man Jim Bridger takes cover in an unexplored valley. There, he runs headlong into a family of escaped slaves who show him the huge footprints and fossilized bones of long-dead monsters.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E9 Law Comes to No Man's Land Marshal Chris Madsen helps newly appointed judge John Buford bring law and order to Oklahoma's Panhandle in an area known as No Man's Land. After escorting a wagon train of prisoners to Beaver City, they set up their first courthouse inside a saloon.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E12 The Battle of Stone Corral When bandits rob a train and gun down a pursuing marshal, they spark one of the largest manhunts in California history. After taking shelter behind the crumbling walls of Stone Corral, they make their final stand against a hail of gunfire.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E5 Joe Walker: Humble Hero Joe Walker doesn't head west to seek fame and fortune, but his trailblazing explorations across the uncharted frontier usher in a golden age of expansion and settlement that help create the United States as we know them today.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E12 Song of Isiah Isiah Burke and his wife Rosemary are abolitionists who are trying to lead a group to freedom. Jimmy, who is visiting his sister, becomes involved with them but soon finds out that their tactics are too violent.

programme.title: Elkhorn
programme.desc: S1 E3 Rustlers Theodore Roosevelt's early efforts to become a cattleman are jeopardized when a neighboring rancher accuses his men of rustling cattle. To save Elkhorn's reputation, Roosevelt and his men must capture the real thief and return the stolen livestock.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E31 The Jailbird Bessie Steel Weaver welcomes her husband, Farley, home after his release from prison. Lucas hires him as a hand believing he has changed his ways. However, when a murder occurs during a local robbery, suspicions are aroused.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E32 Meeting at Midnight Lucas' old Army buddy, Tom Benton, comes to North Fork raising a ruckus. Micah arrests him and Lucas bails him out. Benton, an undercover federal agent, wants to stay in jail to hopefully infiltrate a gang of bank robbers.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E33 Nora An old flame of Lucas' comes to North Fork. After Lucas learns she is sick and her deceased husband spent all her money, he goes to help. However, all is not as it seems as she didn't come alone, and Lucas' good deed involves him in a murder.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E34 The Hangman Lucas arrives at Eban Muchen's ranch to deliver supplies. He finds Muchen's body and hired hand, Voleny Adams, right next to him. Adams denies he killed Muchen, but no one in town believes the ex-convict and want him to hang.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E15 The Last Train West Cheyenne is on the run from the law after being falsely accused of murder. He boards a west-bound train for California, but a reverend's daughter interrupts his plans when she threatens to turn him in.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Dark Rider Swindled by a charming woman, Cheyenne soon tracks her down as she drives her herd of cattle to Kansas. He joins the drive and finds out that one of the wranglers is a murderer.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E34 The Hangman Lucas arrives at Eban Muchen's ranch to deliver supplies. He finds Muchen's body and hired hand, Voleny Adams, right next to him. Adams denies he killed Muchen, but no one in town believes the ex-convict and want him to hang.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E15 The Last Train West Cheyenne is on the run from the law after being falsely accused of murder. He boards a west-bound train for California, but a reverend's daughter interrupts his plans when she threatens to turn him in.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Dark Rider Swindled by a charming woman, Cheyenne soon tracks her down as she drives her herd of cattle to Kansas. He joins the drive and finds out that one of the wranglers is a murderer.

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: A timber baron plans to take advantage of a new law and make millions. Making his money turns out to be harder than he ever thought when the Quakers who own the land refuse to sell their precious trees.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E15 Suspicion Lucas and Mark find Winslow Quince stranded in the desert with a broken wagon wheel. They stop to help, and when they get to North Fork with Quince, many note his gold coin purchases and lavish gifts. Lucas is suspicious, and townsfolk want answers.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E16 The Sidewinder Gridley Maule comes to North Fork with revenge on his mind and confronts Lucas, who shot and killed his father years ago during a bank robbery. When Gridley tries to get Mark to fight, Micah puts him in jail, and Lou steps in to reform the young boy.

programme.title: Legends of the Pony Express
programme.desc: Heroic Pony Express riders and station keepers face deadly terrain, hostile Native Americans, and dangerous outlaws to deliver vital mail across the untamed frontier. Their life-and-death adventures unite the country and become the stuff of legends.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Dalton Gang Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter and sheriff, is now working as a newspaperman. He heads west again to uncover the real story behind the most brazen bank robbery of the Old West. Masterson tracks down the sole survivor of the Dalton Gang, who relives the horrible day when they attempted to rob two banks at the same time. The youngest of the Dalton brothers, Emmett Dalton describes how the gang was gunned down as they tried to make their getaway. Despite numerous gunshot wounds, Emmett lived to serve his time in prison and renounce his life of crime.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Great Train Robbery Bat Masterson, former gunfighter and sheriff, is now working as a newspaperman. He heads west again to uncover the story behind one of the country’s greatest train robberies. Although Butch and Sundance are long gone, Masterson tracks down Sundance’s former girlfriend, Etta Place, to draw out more details. To pull off the audacious robbery, they used official Union Pacific lanterns to signal the train and fool the engineer into believing a bridge was out. As Etta reluctantly relives the events of the robbery and its aftermath, it’s obvious that she is still smitten by Sundance after all of these years.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E7 Jim Clyman: Frontier Survivor When he is separated from his trapping party, frontiersman Jim Clyman is 600 miles from the nearest fort. To survive the grueling trek, he must put his fate in the hands of Native Americans, without knowing if they will help him or kill him on sight.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E13 Spies The Kid befriends a young woman named Margaret, who unbeknownst to him, is a charming spy. His kindness toward her results in him and the other riders becoming involved in an elaborate scheme to steal a gold shipment.

programme.title: Elkhorn
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Stranglers After some of Theodore Roosevelt's new horses are stolen, he joins a posse of vigilantes to hunt down the thieves. When they capture a lone outcast who swears his innocence, Roosevelt learns firsthand that frontier justice isn't always just.

programme.title: Cavalry Charge
programme.desc: When two brothers each decide to fight on opposite sides in the Civil War, they never dreamed they would need to reunite and fight together. It is the only chance they have, if they hope to survive a brutal Indian attack.

programme.title: The Last Days of Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: When the famous James brothers give up robbing banks and attempt to live as reputable gentleman farmers, they are soon forced to seek revenge on the men who bomb their mother's house, crippling her, and killing their stepbrother.

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: A timber baron plans to take advantage of a new law and make millions. Making his money turns out to be harder than he ever thought when the Quakers who own the land refuse to sell their precious trees.

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: "The 700 Club," which first broadcast in 1966, is a newsmagazine featuring guests, news, music, testimonies and spiritual stories from a Christian perspective. News stories are frequently related to Bible passages or deal with Christian lifestyle issues. Hosts of the long-running religious show include televangelist (and former candidate for the Republican presidential nomination) Pat Robertson, Terry Meeuwsen and Gordon Robertson, son of Pat. News items of interest are delivered by anchor John Jessup.

programme.title: Life With Elizabeth
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Alvin argue over planting an oak tree on the patio; a TV repairman makes a house call; a ditzy carhop at a drive-in restaurant.

programme.title: Mountain Masters
programme.desc: S1 E1 Survive and Conquer On every episode, four expert survivalists from across the country compete against each other as they race up a treacherous mountain. Their wilderness skills and mental fortitude are put to the test over the course of three grueling challenges while they are evaluated by judges. One-by-one, the contestants are eliminated until only one remains at the summit to claim the $10,000 prize and the title of Mountain Master.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E19 The Spoiler An elderly couple move to North Fork and settle down under a false name to keep the town from knowing they are parents of a vicious killer on the loose. However, their plan fails when their son shows up and causes chaos.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E20 Heller A teenage girl named Heller and her brother are abused by her drunken stepfather. The town becomes aware after Heller is caught stealing from the general store. The children plan the drunk's demise as the cruelty continues. Lucas steps in to help.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E21 The Grasshopper When Lucas and Mark go on a train trip, clouds of swarming grasshoppers force the train to stop. A prisoner takes advantage of the emergency and breaks free, then kills Marshal Dixon. Lucas, with the help of a buffalo hunter, outwits the outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E22 A Time for Singing Outlaws kill a preacher and his wife. Two members of the group assume their identity and come to North Fork to rob the bank. However, when Mark finds out who they really are, he is kidnapped and kept quiet. Lucas and Micah set out to stop the gang.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E9 Rendezvous at Red Rock A bank robber guilty of murder frees Cheyenne after he's accused of the crime and lures him in on a deal to rob a bank in Red Rock. However, Cheyenne foils the bank robber's plans after he meets the town's marshal.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E10 West of the River Cheyenne leads a group of stockade prisoners on a mission to rescue two girls kidnapped by the Kiowa five years ago. Along the journey, he begins to wonder if the girls really do want to be returned to their father after all.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Kid The Kid becomes part of a group of six Pony Express riders in the Old West based at the Sweetwater Station in the Nebraska territory. He meets station master, Teaspoon Hunter, and fellow riders, Buck, Jimmy, Ike, Cody and Lou.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E2 Gunfighter Childhood memories are torturing Jimmy. When he accidentally spooks a horse, the man riding it is insulted. The man, Longley, is a hired gun and demands an apology. Teaspoon tries to help Jimmy with his issues, but he decides to fight the man.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E7 The Assailants When Senator Jim Borden visits North Fork, Marshal Micah Torrance receives a telegram stating an assassination attempt could be made on the senator's life. The plot begins to unfold as four gunman disguised as cavalrymen arrive with a Gatling gun.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E8 Mark's Rifle Marty Blair rides into North Fork to promote a circus coming out west from Ohio. Blair is soon under suspicion when there is an attempted robbery at the hotel. Mark finds it hard to believe that Blair is guilty, however, Lucas feels differently.

programme.title: Only the Valiant
programme.desc: A cavalry officer is blamed by his men and his lady for the death of a popular officer. Now, he must find a way to stop an Indian attack on their fort. It might prove to be the only way to regain the trust of his men and the affection of his woman.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: It's the late 1800s and a marshal must stop a volatile and growing conflict between homesteaders and cattle drivers in his small town on the Kansas frontier.

programme.title: Mountain Masters
programme.desc: S1 E1 Survive and Conquer On every episode, four expert survivalists from across the country compete against each other as they race up a treacherous mountain. programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E10 West of the River Cheyenne leads a group of stockade prisoners on a mission to rescue two girls kidnapped by the Kiowa five years ago. Along the journey, he begins to wonder if the girls really do want to be returned to their father after all.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E3 Home of the Brave After an Indian attack on settlers, Buck finds himself in the middle, torn between his loyalty to his Kiowa brother and his bond with Pony Express members. After the tribe captures Ike, Buck must prove that he is a real Indian at heart.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E4 Speak No Evil Ike witnesses a stagecoach massacre and turns the killer's leader over to the marshal. However, the gang kidnaps and threatens to kill one of the riders if Ike testifies. It is a race against time to serve justice and keep one of their own alive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E9 The Most Amazing Man Wade Randall comes to North Fork and mesmerizes children with big stories of his past gun battles with outlaws. Lucas suspects he is all talk and exposes the truth after Randall refuses to accept a shootout challenge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E10 Squeeze Play A land speculator named Willard Prescott contacts Lucas about buying his land as the railroad is fast approaching the area. He bribes Lucas and when he refuses, Prescott makes it clear he will stop at nothing to get his land, one way or the other.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S2 E10 Last Hand Standing In the season finale of Ultimate Cowboy Showdown, the top three competitors cowboy up for a chance to win it all. In the last elimination challenge, the cowboys must work as a team to separate the prized cattle from two hundred other cows and drive the herd to a semi-truck, where they will load them up for the winner to take home. A big job for three cowboys, frustrations get the best of them. One contestant covers the rougher country to stand out to the judges. Another cowboy suggests breaking the rules to finish the job, but their teammate steps up and takes the lead to get the job done right. Trace sits down with each cowboy to talk about what winning would mean to them before announcing the Ultimate Cowboy Showdown winner.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E2 Bass Reeves: A Father's Justice After a man murders his wife in a jealous rage and goes on the run, local lawmen are stunned when legendary Marshal Bass Reeves accepts responsibility for bringing the killer to justice...because the murderer is none other than Reeves' own son.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E10 Willie Kennard Makes His Mark in History Under siege by gunslingers, the gold mining town of Yankee Hill runs a newspaper advertisement to find a new marshal. Former slave and Union soldier Willie Kennard answers the ad, but he faces prejudice and doubt as he works to restore law and order.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E8 William Sublette: King of the Fur Trade In his quest to become king of the fur trade, William Sublette revolutionizes the industry and puts his life on the line in the process. But he may risk too much when he rushes to save his comrades in the largest battle of the mountain man era.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E10 A Tiger's Tale Cody and Noah have the huge task of delivering a tiger to St. Joseph, Missouri, while protecting two nuns and a young lady named Elizabeth. Cody soon falls for Elizabeth. Soon trouble arises when they must fight off hunters wanting the tiger's hide.

programme.title: Elkhorn
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Greenhorn After suffering a great personal loss, 25-year-old Theodore Roosevelt abandons New York for the lawless Dakota Badlands. Along the way, he faces doubters and killers as he attempts to establish the Elkhorn Ranch and remake himself into a cattleman.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E23 The Deserter A wounded Army deserter shows up at the McCain Ranch desperate for a horse. Lucas takes him in just as the Army Cavalry unit appears to take the deserter into custody. In town, the harsh commanding officer demands he be executed for desertion.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E24 The Vision Mark drinks some tainted water from a barrel and contracts typhoid fever. Lucas is forced to use an eccentric old doctor. During bouts of a continuous intense fever, Mark becomes delirious and has a vision of his deceased mother, who he never knew.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E25 The Lariat Lariat Jones, an old friend of Lucas', comes to North Fork to open up a new gambling casino. Jones has an excellent reputation as an honest gambler. But when two strangers become his partners, accusations of cheating become deadly for Jones.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E26 Smoke Screen A beautiful headstrong young woman named Marge Crandell doesn't like to be told what to do by anyone. Several men vie for her attention and when Lucas finds her dead, one of the men becomes a prime suspect due to a simple clue, a half-smoked cigar.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E11 Quicksand In order to help a wagon load of traveling settlers in need of rescue and supplies, Cheyenne fights to show his courage against an Indian chief in a pit of swallowing sand. The first one to yell for help loses the fight.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E12 Fury at Rio Hondo As Cheyenne travels through Mexico, he finds himself in an area plagued by political unrest from revolutionaries. He encounters a blonde pickpocket singer in Rio Hondo who happens to be with a man who owes him money from a cattle deal.

But he may risk too much when he rushes to save his comrades in the largest battle of the mountain man era.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E10 A Tiger's Tale Cody and Noah have the huge task of delivering a tiger to St. Joseph, Missouri, while protecting two nuns and a young lady named Elizabeth. Cody soon falls for Elizabeth. Soon trouble arises when they must fight off hunters wanting the tiger's hide.

programme.title: Elkhorn
programme.desc: S1 E1 The Greenhorn After suffering a great personal loss, 25-year-old Theodore Roosevelt abandons New York for the lawless Dakota Badlands. Along the way, he faces doubters and killers as he attempts to establish the Elkhorn Ranch and remake himself into a cattleman.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E23 The Deserter A wounded Army deserter shows up at the McCain Ranch desperate for a horse. Lucas takes him in just as the Army Cavalry unit appears to take the deserter into custody. In town, the harsh commanding officer demands he be executed for desertion.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E24 The Vision Mark drinks some tainted water from a barrel and contracts typhoid fever. Lucas is forced to use an eccentric old doctor. During bouts of a continuous intense fever, Mark becomes delirious and has a vision of his deceased mother, who he never knew.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E25 The Lariat Lariat Jones, an old friend of Lucas', comes to North Fork to open up a new gambling casino. Jones has an excellent reputation as an honest gambler. But when two strangers become his partners, accusations of cheating become deadly for Jones.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E26 Smoke Screen A beautiful headstrong young woman named Marge Crandell doesn't like to be told what to do by anyone. Several men vie for her attention and when Lucas finds her dead, one of the men becomes a prime suspect due to a simple clue, a half-smoked cigar.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E11 Quicksand In order to help a wagon load of traveling settlers in need of rescue and supplies, Cheyenne fights to show his courage against an Indian chief in a pit of swallowing sand. The first one to yell for help loses the fight.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E12 Fury at Rio Hondo As Cheyenne travels through Mexico, he finds himself in an area plagued by political unrest from revolutionaries. He encounters a blonde pickpocket singer in Rio Hondo who happens to be with a man who owes him money from a cattle deal.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E5 Bad Blood Lou returns to her childhood orphanage to get her younger brother and sister. However, her gunrunning father gets to them first and hides them in his compound. When Lou confronts him, the other riders discover that Lou is actually a girl.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E6 Ten-Cent Hero A dime novelist takes revenge on Jimmy by creating a story in his latest novel, penning him as Wild Bill Hickok, "the fastest gun in the West." Soon afterward, a hired gunman arrives in Sweetwater to take him down in a gunfight.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E11 Gun Shy After one of Mark's friends dies due to a shooting accident, he is totally against his father having a rifle. Lucas explains in vain the need for a rifle on the frontier, leading to Mark running away. Meanwhile, Lou has problems with a wanted outlaw.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E12 The Anvil Chorus North Fork's blacksmith, Nils Swenson, volunteers to fill in for Marshal Micah Torrance while he is out of town. To keep the peace, Nils starts a policy that everyone turns in their gun upon entry to the town. His plan backfires when outlaws arrive.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E1 They Killed Me Frontiersman Jim Bridger spins an incredible tale to a group of settlers, claiming he was once killed by Blackfeet warriors yet somehow lived to tell the tale. They think he's joking, but Bridger soon proves that he really did rise from the dead.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E4 Brothers in Arms When they are ambushed by a Blackfeet war party, Jim Bridger and a lone Shoshone brave must work together to find a way to defeat their common enemy. If they can't overcome their suspicions and learn to trust each other, they may not survive the day.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E11 John Wesley Hardin: Killer on the Texas Frontier When outlaw John Wesley Hardin murders a sheriff, a hard-charging Texas Ranger joins forces with a cool-headed police detective to hunt the killer. The unlikely duo must learn how to work together to end Hardin's reign of terror once and for all.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E5 Wong Fee Lee Stakes His Claim Chinese immigrant Wong Fee Lee joins a convoy of miners headed to Deadwood, where he hopes to strike gold and start a business. But when the Black Hills Bandits stand in their way, Wong must find the strength to lead his fellow prospectors in battle.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E2 Joe Meek: Cunning Captive A teenaged Joe Meek arrives on the frontier as a greenhorn, but he quickly masters the skills of mountain man life. Just as his trapping career is taking off, he faces a life-or-death challenge when he's taken captive by warriors from the Crow tribe.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E11 Good Night Sweet Charlotte Charlotte, an old friend of Lou's, comes to Rock Creek and stirs up bad memories of a man who had hurt them both. Lou distances herself from Kid, but when Charlotte turns up dead, Lou confronts her past. Meanwhile, Jimmy befriends a Lakota Indian.

programme.title: Elkhorn
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Frenchman Before it's up and running, Theodore Roosevelt's new Elkhorn Ranch is threatened by a powerful neighbor who attempts an underhanded land grab. To save his ranch, Roosevelt confronts his neighbor, the Marquis de Mores, and his beguiling wife, Medora.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E27 Shotgun Man Lucas receives several mysterious threatening notes. He discovers they are being sent from ex-convict, John Beaumont, who is bent on revenge. Beaumont wants Lucas dead since he is the one responsible for his imprisonment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E28 Sins of the Father Andy Moon and his young son, Bobby, take shelter at the McCain Ranch. Andy killed a man in a gunfight in self-defense. Now, the man's brothers are after Moon. Complications arise when Bobby discovers the truth about their running from town to town.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E29 The Prodigal A bank robber hides at the McCain Ranch and takes Lucas and Mark hostage. Problems arise when the gunman's mother shows up, believing he owns the ranch and Mark is her grandson. The truth comes out when more gunmen arrive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E30 The Fourflusher Sharecropper Gabe Fenway enters his horse, Sapphire, in a race. His landlord, Jake Preston, bets Fenway that Mark's horse, Blueboy, will win. Preston wants Fenway's farm and bets $1000 against his whole year of crops. He will stop at nothing to win.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E13 Star in the Dust During his travels, Cheyenne arrives in a small town and quickly befriends the local sheriff. However, he soon finds himself caught up with a pretty young woman, as well as a stash of stolen money, which jeopardizes his new friendship.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E14 Johnny Bravo A wealthy rancher hires Cheyenne as a ranch foreman. Shortly after he begins his duties, his friend falls in love with the boss' beautiful daughter. However, the rancher has other plans, as his sights are set on Cheyenne to become his new son-in-law.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E5 Bad Blood Lou returns to her childhood orphanage to get her younger brother and sister. However, her gunrunning father gets to them first and hides them in his compound. When Lou confronts him, the other riders discover that Lou is actually a girl.

programme.desc: S2 E29 The Prodigal A bank robber hides at the McCain Ranch and takes Lucas and Mark hostage. Problems arise when the gunman's mother shows up, believing he owns the ranch and Mark is her grandson. The truth comes out when more gunmen arrive.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E30 The Fourflusher Sharecropper Gabe Fenway enters his horse, Sapphire, in a race. His landlord, Jake Preston, bets Fenway that Mark's horse, Blueboy, will win. Preston wants Fenway's farm and bets $1000 against his whole year of crops. He will stop at nothing to win.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E13 Star in the Dust During his travels, Cheyenne arrives in a small town and quickly befriends the local sheriff. However, he soon finds himself caught up with a pretty young woman, as well as a stash of stolen money, which jeopardizes his new friendship.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E14 Johnny Bravo A wealthy rancher hires Cheyenne as a ranch foreman. Shortly after he begins his duties, his friend falls in love with the boss' beautiful daughter. However, the rancher has other plans, as his sights are set on Cheyenne to become his new son-in-law.

programme.title: False Colors
programme.desc: The Kid enjoys a reunion with his long-lost brother, Jed. It seems as though Jed has found his place in the Army. However, he is actually posing as a cavalry member and is leading a gang to steal a gold shipment for the Confederacy.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E7 A Good Day to Die The Kid finds a young Indian warrior at the scene of a massacre and takes him into custody to face justice in Sweetwater. The warrior, named Curly, denies any wrongdoing. The Kid and the riders try to determine if he is responsible for the crime.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E13 Conflict While hunting, Lucas misses an easy shot at a cougar just a few feet away, and seconds from attacking Mark. After discovering that his gun is not the problem, Lucas begins to doubt his abilities with a rifle, leading him to do some soul-searching.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E14 Incident at Line Shack Six Railroad boss John Gangling runs an operation at Line Shack Six. Gangling pays his men in gold and when he finds that Charlie Been saves his wages in a money belt, he kills him for it. An innocent Indian who happens to stop by is accused of murder.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Spirit of Truth After his fur trapping expedition is surprised by a Crow war party, legendary mountain man Jim Bridger suddenly finds himself in a desperate struggle to rescue his fellow trappers when one of them goes missing, and another is on the brink of madness.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Fossil Feud When bloodthirsty Canadian trappers try to kill him, mountain man Jim Bridger takes cover in an unexplored valley. There, he runs headlong into a family of escaped slaves who show him the huge footprints and fossilized bones of long-dead monsters.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E9 Law Comes to No Man's Land Marshal Chris Madsen helps newly appointed judge John Buford bring law and order to Oklahoma's Panhandle in an area known as No Man's Land. After escorting a wagon train of prisoners to Beaver City, they set up their first courthouse inside a saloon.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E12 The Battle of Stone Corral When bandits rob a train and gun down a pursuing marshal, they spark one of the largest manhunts in California history. After taking shelter behind the crumbling walls of Stone Corral, they make their final stand against a hail of gunfire.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E5 Joe Walker: Humble Hero Joe Walker doesn't head west to seek fame and fortune, but his trailblazing explorations across the uncharted frontier usher in a golden age of expansion and settlement that help create the United States as we know them today.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E12 Song of Isiah Isiah Burke and his wife Rosemary are abolitionists who are trying to lead a group to freedom. Jimmy, who is visiting his sister, becomes involved with them but soon finds out that their tactics are too violent.

programme.title: Elkhorn
programme.desc: S1 E3 Rustlers Theodore Roosevelt's early efforts to become a cattleman are jeopardized when a neighboring rancher accuses his men of rustling cattle. To save Elkhorn's reputation, Roosevelt and his men must capture the real thief and return the stolen livestock.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E31 The Jailbird Bessie Steel Weaver welcomes her husband, Farley, home after his release from prison. Lucas hires him as a hand believing he has changed his ways. However, when a murder occurs during a local robbery, suspicions are aroused.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E32 Meeting at Midnight Lucas' old Army buddy, Tom Benton, comes to North Fork raising a ruckus. Micah arrests him and Lucas bails him out. Benton, an undercover federal agent, wants to stay in jail to hopefully infiltrate a gang of bank robbers.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E33 Nora An old flame of Lucas' comes to North Fork. After Lucas learns she is sick and her deceased husband spent all her money, he goes to help. However, all is not as it seems as she didn't come alone, and Lucas' good deed involves him in a murder.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E34 The Hangman Lucas arrives at Eban Muchen's ranch to deliver supplies. He finds Muchen's body and hired hand, Voleny Adams, right next to him. Adams denies he killed Muchen, but no one in town believes the ex-convict and want him to hang.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E15 The Last Train West Cheyenne is on the run from the law after being falsely accused of murder. He boards a west-bound train for California, but a reverend's daughter interrupts his plans when she threatens to turn him in.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Dark Rider Swindled by a charming woman, Cheyenne soon tracks her down as she drives her herd of cattle to Kansas. He joins the drive and finds out that one of the wranglers is a murderer.

programme.title: False Colors
programme.desc: The Kid enjoys a reunion with his long-lost brother, Jed. It seems as though Jed has found his place in the Army. However, he is actually posing as a cavalry member and is leading a gang to steal a gold shipment for the Confederacy.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E34 The Hangman Lucas arrives at Eban Muchen's ranch to deliver supplies. He finds Muchen's body and hired hand, Voleny Adams, right next to him. Adams denies he killed Muchen, but no one in town believes the ex-convict and want him to hang.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S1 E15 The Last Train West Cheyenne is on the run from the law after being falsely accused of murder. He boards a west-bound train for California, but a reverend's daughter interrupts his plans when she threatens to turn him in.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Dark Rider Swindled by a charming woman, Cheyenne soon tracks her down as she drives her herd of cattle to Kansas. He joins the drive and finds out that one of the wranglers is a murderer.

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: A timber baron plans to take advantage of a new law and make millions. Making his money turns out to be harder than he ever thought when the Quakers who own the land refuse to sell their precious trees.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E15 Suspicion Lucas and Mark find Winslow Quince stranded in the desert with a broken wagon wheel. They stop to help, and when they get to North Fork with Quince, many note his gold coin purchases and lavish gifts. Lucas is suspicious, and townsfolk want answers.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E16 The Sidewinder Gridley Maule comes to North Fork with revenge on his mind and confronts Lucas, who shot and killed his father years ago during a bank robbery. When Gridley tries to get Mark to fight, Micah puts him in jail, and Lou steps in to reform the young boy.

programme.title: Legends of the Pony Express
programme.desc: Heroic Pony Express riders and station keepers face deadly terrain, hostile Native Americans, and dangerous outlaws to deliver vital mail across the untamed frontier. Their life-and-death adventures unite the country and become the stuff of legends.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E2 The Dalton Gang Bat Masterson, legendary gunfighter and sheriff, is now working as a newspaperman. He heads west again to uncover the real story behind the most brazen bank robbery of the Old West. Masterson tracks down the sole survivor of the Dalton Gang, who relives the horrible day when they attempted to rob two banks at the same time. The youngest of the Dalton brothers, Emmett Dalton describes how the gang was gunned down as they tried to make their getaway. Despite numerous gunshot wounds, Emmett lived to serve his time in prison and renounce his life of crime.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E3 The Great Train Robbery Bat Masterson, former gunfighter and sheriff, is now working as a newspaperman. He heads west again to uncover the story behind one of the country’s greatest train robberies. Although Butch and Sundance are long gone, Masterson tracks down Sundance’s former girlfriend, Etta Place, to draw out more details. To pull off the audacious robbery, they used official Union Pacific lanterns to signal the train and fool the engineer into believing a bridge was out. As Etta reluctantly relives the events of the robbery and its aftermath, it’s obvious that she is still smitten by Sundance after all of these years.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S2 E7 Jim Clyman: Frontier Survivor When he is separated from his trapping party, frontiersman Jim Clyman is 600 miles from the nearest fort. To survive the grueling trek, he must put his fate in the hands of Native Americans, without knowing if they will help him or kill him on sight.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E13 Spies The Kid befriends a young woman named Margaret, who unbeknownst to him, is a charming spy. His kindness toward her results in him and the other riders becoming involved in an elaborate scheme to steal a gold shipment.

programme.title: Elkhorn
programme.desc: S1 E4 The Stranglers After some of Theodore Roosevelt's new horses are stolen, he joins a posse of vigilantes to hunt down the thieves. When they capture a lone outcast who swears his innocence, Roosevelt learns firsthand that frontier justice isn't always just.

programme.title: Cavalry Charge
programme.desc: When two brothers each decide to fight on opposite sides in the Civil War, they never dreamed they would need to reunite and fight together. It is the only chance they have, if they hope to survive a brutal Indian attack.

programme.title: The Last Days of Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: When the famous James brothers give up robbing banks and attempt to live as reputable gentleman farmers, they are soon forced to seek revenge on the men who bomb their mother's house, crippling her, and killing their stepbrother.

programme.title: The Big Trees
programme.desc: A timber baron plans to take advantage of a new law and make millions. Making his money turns out to be harder than he ever thought when the Quakers who own the land refuse to sell their precious trees.
